data.text: @OphirGottlieb What’s the hold up on asset pricing than?

@OphirGottlieb If Ukraine would take the deal and end this war, oil prices would correct and we could explode.  

But the “elites” hell bent on destroying the west have moved on from covid and seem to want war.  And they’re happy to turn Ukraine into Syria to get it.
@OphirGottlieb Need to get rid of Putin then 🚀
